command.description: This command is used to find all the invalid regexes present in the content types and global fields of your stack.
command.alias: Alias (name) assigned to the management token
command.contentTypes: To find invalid regexes within the content types
command.globalFields: To find invalid regexes within the global fields
command.filePath: [optional] The path or the location in your file system where the CSV output file should be stored.
command.help: To show the flags that can be used with this CLI command

errors.login: Could not log in as authorization failed. Log in using csdx auth:login
